definitions.definition: Any large bottom-dwelling anglerfish of the genus Lophius , such as Lophius piscatorius , of the Atlantic , having a large head and mouth.
An angel shark , of the genus Squatina .

main_definition: Any large bottom-dwelling anglerfish of the genus Lophius , such as Lophius piscatorius , of the Atlantic , having a large head and mouth.
secondary_definitions: An angel shark , of the genus Squatina .
